title: Client Wont Stay Open or Update
body:
My client won't update. It opens like this for a bit then just closes itself after a few seconds.

This is the error form the logs:

02/10/2016 16:38 [INFO] Solid LauncherLib [1.0.0.32] initializing...
02/10/2016 16:38 [INFO] Add App[League of Legends Launcher] Exe[C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.exe] to Windows Firewall
02/10/2016 16:38 [INFO] Patcher_AddPackage([LOL.Patcher],[http://lolcdn.leagueoflegends.com/h2f4b5v4/cds/patcher/lol/],[C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\]) successful
02/10/2016 16:38 [INFO] Attempt to retrieve package [http://lolcdn.leagueoflegends.com/h2f4b5v4/cds/patcher/lol/LOL.Patcher.package]
02/10/2016 16:38 [WARNING] Error retrieving [http://lolcdn.leagueoflegends.com/h2f4b5v4/cds/patcher/lol/LOL.Patcher.package] ErrorCode 950

Any way to fix this???

replies.body:
He Arouthor,

I think I know why you might be having issues patching your game client. It looks like you're using a very old installer; the game client in your screenshot is several years old and isn't directed to the right place to receive the newest patch. Please uninstall the old game client and install this one from our website: 

https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload

If you're still having trouble launching or patching the game with the current client installed, a permissions issue is usually the reason for problems to occur. Check out our KB here for details on launching the game as an Administrator: 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4

If you're still having issues, please contact us on the Support Site and provide your Process List, the Launcher, and Patcher logs (we've detailed how to get those logs in these locations: 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3 

and 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq6 ) 

We'll take a deeper look at the information in there and see what could be causing the game to not launch properly.
Thank you! Is there any way I could get my old client to work? Also it appears as though my promotional code has expired. Is there anyone who could add its content to my account for me?

I'm afraid that the old client is incompatible with the current version of League of Legends. If you're inquiring about the validity of your promotional code--I'm guessing you may have purchased the physical Collector's Edition which explains why you have access to the old installer--I recommend contacting my colleagues through the Support Site so they can further investigate it for you:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
